Package controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the logic of how ModifyProduct.fxml functions.

    • isBlank

      public String isBlank(String[] textInput)
      This method compiles the list of blank fields
      Parameters:
      textInput - is a string array of all the fields used to determine which ones (if any) are blank.
      Returns:
      String which will either be blank if there are no empty fields, or which will contain a message listing the blank fields.

    • onCancelModifyProductButtonAction

      public void onCancelModifyProductButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This cancels modifying the product.

      Throws:
      IOException

    • isInt

      public boolean isInt(String searchId)
      This method tests for NumberFormatException when searching the Parts tableview.
      Parameters:
      searchId - is the user input which will follow programming logic to find relevant Inventory items.
      Returns:
      Returns true only if the searchId is an integer

    • onSearchPart

      public boolean onSearchPart()
      This method utilizes the searchBox to find matching parts. This method incorporates the Inventory.lookupPart method.
      Returns:
      Returns to false if no matching items are found in the parts list.

      This method removes any associated parts from the product.
